name: Very Hard Game REMASTERED
description:
Get ready to experience... the best VHG game published!

Inspired from the first three Very Hard Game parts originally published by OMGdino

All previous levels, maps and items mixed into one! (with several more)

With quality as good as the Core of Kazuma!

Available on Android and Mac!

__________________________________________

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys controls! Mobile support available too!

Press 'x' on keyboard to hide mobile input and press 'q' to show

Use Arrow keys and WASD together for a double boost!

Want to focus with no music? Press 'm' to mute and 'p' to unmute

If any components don't work and/or missing, just reload the tab (close app and relaunch for app users)

__________________________________________
